includedAssets.title: Time Has Come Today
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep1 - Time Has Come Today
includedAssets.synopsis: In the season three premiere, Izzie copes with the loss of Denny and her decision to leave the internship programme.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the season three premiere, Izzie copes with the loss of Denny and her decision to leave the internship programme.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the season three premiere, Izzie copes with the loss of Denny and her decision to leave the internship programme.

includedAssets.title: I Am A Tree
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep2 - I Am A Tree
includedAssets.synopsis: Meredith tries to choose between Derek and Finn. Meanwhile, Cristina meets Burke's parents and the interns campaign for Izzie's reinstatement.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Meredith tries to choose between Derek and Finn. Meanwhile, Cristina meets Burke's parents and the interns campaign for Izzie's reinstatement.

includedAssets.title: Sometimes A Fantasy
includedAssets.synopsis: Cristina helps Preston following his surgery and Izzie tries to go back to the hospital. Plus, Alex deals with a patient who has a superhero complex.

includedAssets.title: What I Am
includedAssets.synopsis: Addison questions her medical skills after working with a pregnant woman named Rebecca. Plus, Cristina pushes Burke to get better faster, and Derek and Mark clash.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Addison questions her medical skills after working with a pregnant woman. Plus, Cristina pushes Burke to get better faster, and Derek and Mark clash.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Addison questions her medical skills after working with a pregnant woman named Rebecca. Plus, Cristina pushes Burke to get better faster, and Derek and Mark clash.

includedAssets.title: Oh, The Guilt
includedAssets.synopsis: While Derek learns one of Addison's secrets, Bailey reaches out to a cancer patient and mother who doesn't seem to care about decisions concerning her future.

includedAssets.title: Let The Angels Commit
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep6 - Let The Angels Commit
includedAssets.synopsis: Cristina scrubs in on a rare surgery, inciting the envy of the other interns. Elsewhere, George and Addison work together on a woman pregnant with twins.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cristina scrubs in on a rare surgery, inciting the envy of the other interns. Elsewhere, George and Addison work together on a woman expecting twins.

includedAssets.title: Where The Boys Are
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep7 - Where The Boys Are
includedAssets.synopsis: The men of Seattle Grace go on an eventful camping trip together. Plus, a suspicious Bailey confronts Cristina about her recent actions in the hospital.

includedAssets.title: Staring At The Sun
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep8 - Staring At The Sun
includedAssets.synopsis: When his father has a heart problem that requires surgery, George chooses Burke to perform the procedure. Derek and Meredith work on their relationship too.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When his father has a heart problem that requires surgery, George chooses Burke to perform the procedure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When his father has a heart problem that requires surgery, George chooses Burke to perform the procedure. Derek and Meredith work on their relationship too.

includedAssets.title: From A Whisper To A Scream
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep9 - From A Whisper To A Scream
includedAssets.synopsis: Izzie pushes the boundaries of her probation, and Cristina has a crisis of conscience about her actions with Burke. Plus, a car accident fills the ER.

includedAssets.title: Don't Stand So Close To Me
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep10 - Don't Stand So Close To Me
includedAssets.synopsis: Recent events take a strain on Cristina and Burke's relationship. A surprise is also in store for Meredith when one of her half sisters is admitted.

includedAssets.title: Six Days (Part 1 Of 2)
includedAssets.synopsis: Meredith's father pays her a surprise visit while George's moves from one surgery to the next. Izzie struggles to hand over something important to a patient.

includedAssets.title: Six Days (Part 2 Of 2)
includedAssets.synopsis: Emotions run high when George's dad requires an emergency procedure, and Izzie wants to invest her inheritance in a worthy cause. Addison stirs up trouble too.

includedAssets.title: Great Expectations
includedAssets.synopsis: George takes a novel approach to dealing with the grieving process, and Bailey decides to open a free clinic. Plus, the Chief announces his plans to retire.

includedAssets.title: Wishin' And Hopin'
includedAssets.synopsis: The Chief's announcement stokes the flames of rivalry between Derek, Burke, Addison and Mark. Meanwhile, Meredith learns that her mother has become lucid.

includedAssets.title: Walk On Water
includedAssets.synopsis: Disaster strikes when a cargo ship collides with a ferryboat. Surprises are in store as Meredith and co head out to the site to try and save the few lives spared.

includedAssets.title: Drowning On Dry Land
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep16 - Drowning On Dry Land
includedAssets.synopsis: Emotions run high as the search for Meredith continues. Meanwhile, Izzie takes desperate measures to manage the situation she's in.

includedAssets.title: Some Kind Of Miracle
includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep17 - Some Kind Of Miracle
includedAssets.synopsis: In an emotional instalment, concerns grow for Meredith - can she be revived? The fallout from the ferry disaster continues to be felt too.

includedAssets.title: Scars And Souvenirs
includedAssets.synopsis: Alex grows closer to Jane Doe as he continues to work on her case. Elsewhere, Derek treats a patient near and dear to him, and Callie reveals a secret.

includedAssets.title: Time After Time

includedAssets.altTitle: S3, Ep22 - The Other Side Of This Life (Part 1 of 2)

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: In the third season of the long-running medical drama, some of those at the hospital are forced to deal with crises concerning family members, while others are faced with romantic complications.

includedIn.title: Grey’s Anatomy
includedIn.synopsis: The surgical interns, residents and attendings of Seattle Grace Hospital juggle increasingly complicated procedures and personal lives, while learning what it means to be a good doctor.
